item.title: The Forge Codes (December 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox The Forge monthly redeem codes for December 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including Rerolls and much more.

The Forge is an RPG Roblox experience that revolves around Mining, forging, and fighting different Zombie variants and other enemies. The game boasts a clean Forging mechanic, various Pickaxes, unique Weapons, rare Ores, and an XP-based levelling system, among other features. Races are also another notable feature, as they modify your character’s output and attributes. However, the only way to get Races is by using Spins. This is when redeem codes take centre stage. Players can simply redeem these codes and stack up Spins without spending a single penny. 

Active The Forge Codes

  • PEAK! – 10 Rerolls (Latest)
  • SORRYFORSHUTDOWN – 5 Rerolls

Inactive The Forge Codes

  • 300K!
  • 100KLIKES
  • 200K!
  • 20KLIKES
  • 15KLIKES
  • 5KLIKES
  • BETARELEASE!
  • RELEASE
  • 10KLIKES

How To Redeem The Forge Codes 

Use these steps to redeem all the active codes: 

  1. Launch The Forge and spawn on the server. 
  2. Select the settings button (gear icon) in the top-left corner of the screen. 
  3. Scroll down to the last to spot the code box. 
  4. Enter the code into the “Type Here” text box. 
  5. Press the “Claim” button to redeem the active code. 

More About The Forge Codes

The free Spins redeemed from the codes are automatically credited to your inventory. Just head to the “Race Menu” and use the Spins claimed from the active codes. There are 13 Races, each with unique abilities that boost your avatars’ attributes and grant them special powers.

You’ll receive one Race per Spin. Here are all the Race chances for a Spin: 

  • Human – 25%
  • Elf – 15%
  • Zombie – 14%
  • Goblin – 10.5%
  • Undead – 9%
  • Orc – 8%
  • Dwarf – 7%
  • Shadow – 6%
  • Minotaur – 1.75%
  • Dragonborn – 1.5%
  • Golem – 1.25%
  • Angel – 0.5%
  • Demon – 0.5%

Beginners are allowed to Spin for only one Race. Once they reach levels 30 and 100, the perks of two more Races can be spun and added to their miners.  

Where To Find New The Forge Codes?

New codes are usually released on the game’s official Discord server. Watch the general channels for fresh codes whenever new updates for this RPG game debut. Our active codes list will be updated on a hawk’s notice, so keep track of it to access the latest codes. 

FAQs On The Forge Codes

What are the latest codes in The Forge?

“Peak!” is the only latest active code in The Forge. 

Why are the active codes for The Forge not working?

If an active code fails to redeem, consider it invalid. 

When will new codes be released in The Forge?

You can expect new codes to be released at any time, particularly during major updates and milestones.

Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for 99 Nights in the Forest, Type Soul, and Azure Latch. Also, check out the Insider Gaming Discord server.
